summary: THIS VEHICLE AIR BAG SENSOR HAD A PROBLEM EARLY ON..     BROUGHT TO DEALERSHIP THEY RESET...  *TR    AIR BAG LIGT CAME BACK ON, WANTED ME TO PAY TO RESET IT... SO I NEVER DID...    BUT AS I READ OTHER PEOPLE HAVING THE SAME ISSUE WITH A SENSOR THAT SHUTS OFF THE AIRBAG...   AND LEAVES IT OFF WITH NO WAY TO TURN IT BACK ON... AND A DEFECTIVE SENSOR IN THE SEAT AND THEY NOW WANT 1,400 TO REPLACE IT... WHEN IT HAS NEVER FUNCTIONED...
